my mom went crazy when i was three and i have not seen her since.
I enjoy playing with my parakeet and going for walks to help keep me active.
I'm not normally confrontational, but I would fight to protect my loved ones.
I love listening to classical music while I organize my office supplies on rainy days.

I'm feeling nostalgic today, so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood.

content.text: Hello! It's going well. I'm feeling a bit nostalgic today so I'm going to watch some old movies from my childhood.
That sounds fun! I love watching old movies.
Me too! I just watched The Wizard of Oz the other day.
I love that movie! I've seen it so many times.
I know, right? It's so good.
What other old movies do you like?
I love all the old Disney movies. I also like The Sound of Music and Mary Poppins.
Those are all great movies! I love The Sound of Music.
I'm glad we have the same taste in movies.
Me too! We should watch a movie together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to watch a movie with you.
Great! We can pick a movie and set a date.
Sounds good. I'm free on Saturday.
Great! I'll pick a movie and let you know.
